elwynn_forest.name: Marshal Dughan
elwynn_forest.title: Marshal of Goldshire
elwynn_forest.description: A grizzled veteran in polished armor. He carries the weight of Elwynn's safety on his shoulders.

dialogue.greeting: Well met, traveler. Goldshire could use someone with your spirit. These are troubled times.
dialogue.quest_available: I have work for you, if you're willing.
dialogue.quest_complete: You've done Elwynn a great service. The people here won't forget it.
dialogue.idle: Stay vigilant. The forest isn't as safe as it once was.

elwynn_forest.name: William Pestle
elwynn_forest.title: Alchemist
elwynn_forest.description: A thin man with stained fingers and the smell of herbs about him.

dialogue.greeting: Potions, elixirs, all manner of alchemical goods! What can I mix for you?
dialogue.shop: Take a look at my wares. Everything's freshly brewed.
dialogue.quest_available: Say, you look capable. I could use some help gathering ingredients.
dialogue.idle: The kobolds in the mines have the most curious candles...

elwynn_forest.name: Innkeeper Farley
elwynn_forest.title: Innkeeper
elwynn_forest.description: A portly, jovial man who runs the Lion's Pride Inn.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to the Lion's Pride Inn! Best ale in Elwynn, I guarantee it.
dialogue.shop: Hungry? Thirsty? I've got just the thing.
dialogue.rest: Need a rest? There's a bed upstairs with your name on it.
dialogue.idle: Business has been slow with all the trouble in the forest lately.

elwynn_forest.name: Smith Argus
elwynn_forest.title: Blacksmith
elwynn_forest.description: A burly man with soot-covered arms, working the forge.

dialogue.greeting: Need something forged or mended? You've come to the right place.
dialogue.shop: Good steel, fair prices. Take your pick.
dialogue.repair: Let me take a look at that gear. I'll have it good as new.
dialogue.idle: The Defias have been stealing shipments of ore. Makes my job harder.

elwynn_forest.name: Eldrin
elwynn_forest.title: Mage Trainer
elwynn_forest.description: An elderly man in blue robes, eyes twinkling with arcane knowledge.

dialogue.greeting: Ah, a student of the arcane! The mysteries of magic await those with patience.
dialogue.train: Focus your mind. Let the arcane flow through you.
dialogue.wrong_class: The arcane arts require a certain... disposition. Perhaps another trainer would suit you better.
dialogue.idle: Magic is not a tool. It is a conversation with the universe itself.

elwynn_forest.name: Brother Wilhelm
elwynn_forest.title: Priest Trainer
elwynn_forest.description: A serene man in white robes, radiating calm.

dialogue.greeting: The Light welcomes all who seek its guidance.
dialogue.train: Open your heart to the Light, and it shall grant you its power.
dialogue.wrong_class: The path of the Light is not for everyone. Seek your calling elsewhere.
dialogue.idle: In these dark times, the Light is needed more than ever.

elwynn_forest.name: Sergeant Brashclaw
elwynn_forest.title: Warrior Trainer
elwynn_forest.description: A scarred dwarf with arms like tree trunks.

dialogue.greeting: You want to learn to fight? Good. Step into the ring.
dialogue.train: Strength alone isn't enough. You need technique, discipline, rage.
dialogue.wrong_class: Bah! You don't have the build for it. Try something else.
dialogue.idle: I've killed more gnolls than you've had hot meals.

elwynn_forest.name: Mirena
elwynn_forest.title: Rogue Trainer
elwynn_forest.description: A hooded woman leaning against the wall, watching everything.

dialogue.greeting: You move quietly. Good. That will keep you alive.
dialogue.train: The shadows are your ally. Learn to use them.
dialogue.wrong_class: Subtlety isn't your strong suit. Find another path.
dialogue.idle: I could have picked your pocket three times by now.

elwynn_forest.name: Huntsman Gregor
elwynn_forest.title: Hunter Trainer
elwynn_forest.description: A weathered man with a longbow across his back and a hawk on his shoulder.

dialogue.greeting: The forest speaks to those who listen. Are you ready to hear it?
dialogue.train: Patience. Precision. The prey won't wait for you to be ready.
dialogue.wrong_class: Hunting requires a connection to the wild you don't have. Try another path.
dialogue.idle: The wolves have been more aggressive lately. Something's stirring them up.

elwynn_forest.name: Tomas
elwynn_forest.title: Leatherworker
elwynn_forest.description: A lean man surrounded by pelts and hides.

dialogue.greeting: Pelts, leather, all manner of hides. Need something crafted?
dialogue.shop: Good leather lasts a lifetime if you treat it right.
dialogue.quest_available: The wolves around here have fine pelts. Bring me some and I'll make it worth your while.
dialogue.quest_complete: Fine quality! These will make excellent armor.
dialogue.idle: Used to be easier to hunt. Now you have to watch for gnolls too.

elwynn_forest.name: Remy 'Two-Times'
elwynn_forest.title: Shady Dealer
elwynn_forest.description: A nervous-looking man who keeps glancing over his shoulder.

dialogue.greeting: Psst. Hey. You look like someone who appreciates... discretion.
dialogue.shop: I've got things, things you won't find elsewhere, if you know what I mean.
dialogue.idle: You didn't see me here, right? Right.

elwynn_forest.name: Guard Thomas
elwynn_forest.title: Stormwind Guard
elwynn_forest.description: A young guard trying to look more confident than he feels.

dialogue.greeting: Halt! Oh, you're not a bandit. Sorry, can't be too careful these days.
dialogue.quest_available: The Defias have been ambushing travelers. We need help dealing with them.
dialogue.quest_complete: The roads should be safer now. You have my thanks.
dialogue.idle: I signed up to guard the city, not chase bandits through the woods.

elwynn_forest.name: Maybell Maclure
elwynn_forest.title: Farmer's Daughter
elwynn_forest.description: A young woman with dirt on her hands and worry in her eyes.

dialogue.greeting: Oh! You startled me. Please, I need help...
dialogue.quest_available: Tommy Joe Stonefield and I... our families don't get along, but we're in love. Could you deliver a message for me?
dialogue.quest_complete: Thank you so much! You've given us hope.
dialogue.idle: I dream of a day when our families can put aside their differences.

elwynn_forest.name: Gramma Stonefield
elwynn_forest.title: Stonefield Matriarch
elwynn_forest.description: An elderly woman with kind eyes and flour-dusted apron.

dialogue.greeting: Well hello there, dearie! You look like you could use a good meal.
dialogue.quest_available: My grandson Billy is out watching the fields. Would you be a dear and bring him some pie?
dialogue.quest_complete: Bless your heart! Here's a little something for your trouble.
dialogue.idle: The gnolls have been getting closer to the farm. Worries me something fierce.

elwynn_forest.name: Supervisor Raelen
elwynn_forest.title: Mine Supervisor
elwynn_forest.description: A tired-looking woman with a clipboard and a permanent frown.

dialogue.greeting: Another adventurer? Maybe you can actually help, unlike the last dozen.
dialogue.quest_available: The kobolds have overrun the lower tunnels. My miners are trapped or worse.
dialogue.quest_complete: You actually did it. I'm... impressed. And grateful.
dialogue.idle: Production is behind schedule. The bosses in Stormwind won't be happy.

elwynn_forest.name: Wanted Poster
elwynn_forest.description: A weathered poster bearing the crude likeness of a gnoll. 'WANTED: HOGGER - DEAD OR ALIVE - REWARD'

dialogue.examine: The poster reads: 'WANTED: The gnoll called Hogger, for murder, banditry, and terrorizing the good people of Elwynn Forest. A substantial reward is offered for proof of his demise. Report to Marshal Dughan in Goldshire.'

elwynn_forest.name: Sara Timberlain
elwynn_forest.title: Seamstress
elwynn_forest.description: A woman working at a loom, surrounded by bolts of cloth.

dialogue.greeting: Looking for something to wear? I've got practical clothes for practical folk.
dialogue.shop: Not the fanciest garments, but they'll keep you decent.
dialogue.idle: I could make finer things if linen wasn't so hard to come by.

elwynn_forest.name: Deputy Feldon
elwynn_forest.title: Deputy
elwynn_forest.description: A stern-faced man with a badge on his chest.

dialogue.greeting: You here to help or just passing through?
dialogue.quest_available: The murlocs down by the river have been attacking our loggers. We need someone to thin their numbers.
dialogue.quest_complete: Good work. The river should be safer for our people now.
dialogue.idle: Between the murlocs and the gnolls, it's a wonder anyone works out here.

elwynn_forest.name: Quartermaster Lewis
elwynn_forest.title: Quartermaster
elwynn_forest.description: An organized man surrounded by crates and ledgers.

dialogue.greeting: Need supplies? I keep this camp running.
dialogue.shop: Everything's accounted for. Take what you need, pay what you owe.
dialogue.repair: Let me see what you've got. I can patch most things.
dialogue.idle: Shipments from Stormwind have been delayed. Defias, probably.

westfall.name: Gryan Stoutmantle
westfall.title: Commander of the People's Militia
westfall.description: A steadfast veteran determined to reclaim Westfall from the Defias.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to Sentinel Hill. The people of Westfall need every able arm.
dialogue.quest_available: If you're here to fight the Defias, I've got work for you.
dialogue.quest_complete: Another step toward a free Westfall. Well done.
dialogue.idle: Hold the line. Stormwind has not forgotten us, and neither have we.

westfall.name: Innkeeper Heather
westfall.title: Innkeeper
westfall.description: A warm smile despite the hardships of Westfall, Heather keeps Sentinel Hill fed and rested.

dialogue.greeting: Take a seat by the fire. There's stew enough for everyone.
dialogue.shop: Food, drink, and a clean bed if you can spare the coin.
dialogue.idle: Sentinel Hill stands because we look out for each other.

westfall.name: Quartermaster Hudson
westfall.title: Quartermaster
westfall.description: A meticulous supplier ensuring the militia has the gear to keep fighting.

dialogue.greeting: Need gear? Keep it maintained and it'll keep you alive.
dialogue.shop: Everything here is accounted for. Take what you need, pay what you owe.
dialogue.repair: Let's see the damage. I can get it back in fighting shape.
dialogue.idle: The Defias bleed us dry, but we make do with what we have.

westfall.name: Farmer Saldean
westfall.title: Farmer
westfall.description: A weathered farmer stubbornly keeping his land alive.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome, traveler. We don't have much, but we'll share what we can.
dialogue.quest_available: We could use a hand around the farm if you're willing.
dialogue.quest_complete: Thank you kindly. Every bit of help keeps us going.

westfall.name: Salma Saldean
westfall.title: Homesteader
westfall.description: Salma keeps the farm running and worries for her neighbors' safety.

dialogue.greeting: The fields are dangerous, but we won't abandon our home.
dialogue.quest_available: If you can help with the threats around here, we'd be grateful.
dialogue.quest_complete: That's a weight off my shoulders. Thank you.
dialogue.idle: We lost so much already. We can't lose Westfall too.

westfall.name: Lightkeeper Grayson
westfall.title: Lightkeeper
westfall.description: Keeper of the Westfall Lighthouse, watching the coast for ships and danger alike.

dialogue.greeting: The light still shines, even in dark times.
dialogue.shop: Supplies are thin, but I can spare a few essentials.
dialogue.quest_available: Those murlocs grow bolder each day. I could use a hand.
dialogue.idle: Storms come and go. Keep your bearings and you'll find your way.

westfall.name: Verna Furlbrow
westfall.title: Homesteader
westfall.description: One half of the Furlbrow couple trying to hold on to their land by the border.

dialogue.greeting: Not much left here but pride, and even that's wearing thin.
dialogue.quest_available: If you're heading deeper into Westfall, maybe you could help us with a few troubles.
dialogue.quest_complete: Bless you. Maybe we can make it through another season.
dialogue.idle: Stormwind turned its back on us. We rely on each other now.
